colors.foreground: light-dark(color-mix(in hsl, var(--theme-color) 8%, white 92%), color-mix(in hsl, var(--theme-color) 10%, black 90%))
colors.cardForeground: light-dark(color-mix(in hsl, var(--theme-color) 6%, white 94%), color-mix(in hsl, var(--theme-color) 8%, black 92%))
colors.popoverForeground: light-dark(color-mix(in hsl, var(--theme-color) 6%, white 94%), color-mix(in hsl, var(--theme-color) 8%, black 92%))
colors.primaryForeground: light-dark(color-mix(in hsl, var(--theme-color) 3%, white 97%), color-mix(in hsl, var(--theme-color) 5%, black 95%))
colors.secondaryForeground: light-dark(color-mix(in hsl, var(--theme-color) 3%, white 97%), color-mix(in hsl, var(--theme-color) 5%, black 95%))
colors.mutedForeground: light-dark(color-mix(in hsl, var(--theme-color) 20%, white 80%), color-mix(in hsl, var(--theme-color) 25%, black 75%))
colors.accentForeground: light-dark(color-mix(in hsl, var(--theme-color) 3%, white 97%), color-mix(in hsl, var(--theme-color) 5%, black 95%))
colors.destructiveForeground: light-dark(color-mix(in hsl, var(--theme-color) 3%, white 97%), color-mix(in hsl, var(--theme-color) 5%, black 95%))
colors.input: light-dark(color-mix(in hsl, var(--theme-color) 0%, white 80%), color-mix(in hsl, var(--theme-color) 0%, black 80%))
colors.inputBackground: light-dark(color-mix(in hsl, var(--theme-color) 0%, black 60%), color-mix(in hsl, var(--theme-color) 0%, white 70%))

fonts.mono: ui-monospace, SFMono-Regular, 'SF Mono', Consolas, 'Liberation Mono', Menlo, monospace
fonts.heading: ui-sans-serif, system-ui, sans-serif

shadows.card: 0 4px 6px -1px color-mix(in hsl, var(--theme-color) 0%, black 25%), 0 2px 4px -1px color-mix(in hsl, var(--theme-color) 0%, black 20%)
shadows.dropdown: 0 10px 15px -3px color-mix(in hsl, var(--theme-color) 0%, black 30%), 0 4px 6px -2px color-mix(in hsl, var(--theme-color) 0%, black 20%)

header.color: light-dark(color-mix(in hsl, var(--theme-color) 6%, white 94%), color-mix(in hsl, var(--theme-color) 8%, black 92%))

row.color: light-dark(color-mix(in hsl, var(--theme-color) 5%, white 95%), color-mix(in hsl, var(--theme-color) 7%, black 93%))

hover.color: light-dark(color-mix(in hsl, var(--theme-color) 2%, white 98%), color-mix(in hsl, var(--theme-color) 4%, black 96%))

selected.color: light-dark(color-mix(in hsl, var(--theme-color) 2%, white 98%), color-mix(in hsl, var(--theme-color) 4%, black 96%))

footer.color: light-dark(color-mix(in hsl, var(--theme-color) 6%, white 94%), color-mix(in hsl, var(--theme-color) 8%, black 92%))

default.color: light-dark(color-mix(in hsl, var(--theme-color) 8%, white 92%), color-mix(in hsl, var(--theme-color) 10%, black 90%))

hover.color: light-dark(color-mix(in hsl, var(--theme-color) 2%, white 98%), color-mix(in hsl, var(--theme-color) 3%, black 97%))

active.color: light-dark(color-mix(in hsl, var(--theme-color) 3%, white 97%), color-mix(in hsl, var(--theme-color) 5%, black 95%))

secondary.color: light-dark(color-mix(in hsl, var(--theme-color) 2%, white 98%), color-mix(in hsl, var(--theme-color) 3%, black 97%))

hover.color: light-dark(color-mix(in hsl, var(--theme-color) 2%, white 98%), color-mix(in hsl, var(--theme-color) 3%, black 97%))

active.color: light-dark(color-mix(in hsl, var(--theme-color) 2%, white 98%), color-mix(in hsl, var(--theme-color) 3%, black 97%))

destructive.color: light-dark(color-mix(in hsl, var(--theme-color) 2%, white 98%), color-mix(in hsl, var(--theme-color) 3%, black 97%))

hover.color: light-dark(color-mix(in hsl, var(--theme-color) 2%, white 98%), color-mix(in hsl, var(--theme-color) 3%, black 97%))

active.color: light-dark(color-mix(in hsl, var(--theme-color) 2%, white 98%), color-mix(in hsl, var(--theme-color) 3%, black 97%))

ghost.color: light-dark(color-mix(in hsl, var(--theme-color) 2%, white 98%), color-mix(in hsl, var(--theme-color) 3%, black 97%))

hover.color: light-dark(color-mix(in hsl, var(--theme-color) 2%, white 98%), color-mix(in hsl, var(--theme-color) 3%, black 97%))

active.color: light-dark(color-mix(in hsl, var(--theme-color) 5%, white 95%), color-mix(in hsl, var(--theme-color) 7%, black 93%))

thumb.background: light-dark(color-mix(in hsl, var(--theme-color) 2%, white 98%), color-mix(in hsl, var(--theme-color) 3%, black 97%))
